entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except minus 11 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17 except minus 11 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
